item.title: [JDK-8313260] JDK21: ProblemList java/lang/ScopedValue/StressStackOverflow.java on linux-x86
item.description:
The java/lang/ScopedValue/StressStackOverflow.java test was problem listed on generic-x64, see https://bugs.openjdk.org/browse/JDK-8310822

Unfortunately the test fails on linux-x86 as well.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

item.title: [JDK-8313241] Temporarily disable "malformed control flow" assert to reduce noise
item.description: JDK-8303951 added asserts before several C2 compilation bailouts that we were never able to trigger in our testing. The "malformed control flow" assert now triggers regularly (see JDK-8308392 and JDK-8312980). Let's disable it to reduce the noise in the CI.
item.summary: Temporarily disable "malformed control flow" assert to reduce noise

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Changeset: f242c3b9
Author: Tobias Hartmann <thartmann@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-07-28 06:59:52 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21/commit/f242c3b9f85501f2e425be69f7a61d586020f986
Fix request for JDK 21 approved.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21/pull/146
Date: 2023-07-27 08:05:23 +0000

Fix Request (JDK 21):
It's important to fix this in JDK 21 to reduce the noise in testing and the likelihood of others bugs being hidden by these (harmless) assert failures. The risk is low, we will always bail out from compilation. The fix will be tested through tier1-4.
ILW = Assert failures in C2 (harmless in product but massive failures might hide other bugs), intermittent with several tests, no workaround = MHH = P2

item.title: [JDK-8300937] Update nroff pages in JDK 21 before RC
item.description:
Before RC we need to update the man pages in the open repo from the Markdown sources in the closed repo.

All pages at a minimum have 21-ea replaced with 21, and copyright set to 2023 if needed.
item.summary: Update nroff pages in JDK 21 before RC

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Changeset: 0439d584
Author: David Holmes <dholmes@openjdk.org>
Date: 2023-07-31 21:09:44 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21/commit/0439d584221f4d92fd1f4097a331f83dcdb2c12c

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21/pull/151
Date: 2023-07-31 08:33:07 +0000

Main changes are to use 21 instead of 21-ea. In addition the following files contain additional updates from the closed sources:

- src/java.base/share/man/java.1

 JDK-8273131: Update the java manpage markdown source for JFR filename expansion
 JDK-8221633: StartFlightRecording: consider moving mention of multiple comma-separated parameters to the front

There are also some formatting differences related to:

 JDK-8309670: java -help output for --module-path / -p is incomplete

Likely a different version of pandoc was used.

- src/java.base/share/man/keytool.1

 JDK-8290626: keytool manpage contains a special character

- src/jdk.compiler/share/man/javac.1

 JDK-8308456: Update javac tool page for -proc:full

also some formatting differences.

- src/jdk.jartool/share/man/jarsigner.1

 JDK-8303928: Update jarsigner man page after JDK-8303410

- src/jdk.jcmd/share/man/jcmd.1

 JDK-8273131: Update the java manpage markdown source for JFR filename expansion

- src/jdk.jdeps/share/man/jdeps.1

 JDK-8301207: (jdeps) Deprecate jdeps -profile option

- src/jdk.jfr/share/man/jfr.1

Formatting changes.

- src/jdk.jshell/share/man/jshell.1

 JDK-8308988: Update JShell manpage to include TOOLING description
Time to do this ...

In closed repo:

make update-open-man-pages VERSION_SHORT=21 COPYRIGHT_YEAR=2023
